languages.text: Сверившись с данными центрального станционного когитатора, лексмеханик Порядковый Номер Сорок Два подтверждает: станции необходимы редкие трансурановые элементы или природный газ для проведения закрытых исследований. Сама станция сейчас не может предложить вам ничего взамен, однако представитель Адептус Механикус на Футфоле будет рад отблагодарить Вольного Торговца за помощь.

traits.locale_text: Сверившись с данными центрального станционного когитатора, лексмеханик Порядковый Номер Сорок Два подтверждает: станции необходимы редкие трансурановые элементы или природный газ для проведения закрытых исследований. Сама станция сейчас не может предложить вам ничего взамен, однако представитель Адептус Механикус на Футфоле будет рад отблагодарить вас за помощь.

languages.text: Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer the Rogue Trader anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay {mf|him|her} for {mf|his|her} aid.
languages.original_text: Сверившись с данными центрального станционного когитатора, лексмеханик Порядковый Номер Сорок Два подтверждает: станции необходимы редкие трансурановые элементы или природный газ для проведения закрытых исследований. Сама станция сейчас не может предложить вам ничего взамен, однако представитель Адептус Механикус на Футфоле будет рад отблагодарить Вольного Торговца за помощь.

traits.locale_text: Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, lexmechanic Service Number Forty-Two confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station can't offer you anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will be happy to thank you for your aid.

Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, lexmechanic Service Number Forty-Two confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station can't offer you anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will be happy to thank you for your aid.

Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic, Service Number Forty-Two, confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station can't offer you anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will be happy to thank you for your aid.

Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer you anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay you for your aid.

Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer you anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay you for your aid.

Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer the Rogue Trader anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay {mf|him|her} for {mf|his|her} aid.

languages.text: 在查阅了星站主沉思者的数据之后，思律机僧42号服务单元确认，星站需要稀有的超铀元素或天然气，用以进行某种保密的研究工作。尽管星站目前无法为行商浪人提供任何回报，但机械修会在落脚港的代表一定会为你的援助提供报酬。
languages.original_text: Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer the Rogue Trader anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay {mf|him|her} for {mf|his|her} aid.

traits.locale_text: 在查阅了星站主沉思者的数据之后，思律机僧42号服务单元确认，星站需要稀有的超铀元素或天然气，用以进行某种保密的研究工作。尽管星站目前无法为行商浪人提供任何回报，但机械修会在落脚港的代表一定会为你的援助提供报酬。

languages.text: Tras consultar los datos del cogitador principal de la estación, el lexmecánico Unidad de Servicio 42 confirma que la estación necesita elementos raros de transuranio o gas natural para una investigación de naturalezaconfidencial. Por su parte, la estación no puede ofrecer a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente nada a cambio por ahora, pero el representante del Adeptus Mechanicus en Paso se encargará de compensar su ayuda.
languages.original_text: Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer the Rogue Trader anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay {mf|him|her} for {mf|his|her} aid.

traits.locale_text: Tras consultar los datos del cogitador principal de la estación, el lexmecánico Unidad de Servicio 42 confirma que la estación necesita elementos raros de transuranio o gas natural para una investigación que no puede compartir. Por su parte, la estación no puede ofrecerte nada a cambio por ahora, pero el representante del Adeptus Mechanicus en Paso te compensará por tu ayuda.

languages.text: 法技術者サービスユニット42がステーションのメイン考算機からのデータを調査した結果、ステーションが非公開の研究用に希少な超ウラン元素または天然ガスを必要としていると確認した。ステーション側としては今のところ、ローグトレーダーに交換条件を提示できないが、フットフォールの帝国技術局の代表は{mf|him|her}援助{mf|his|her}に必ず報いるだろう。
languages.original_text: Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer the Rogue Trader anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay {mf|him|her} for {mf|his|her} aid.

traits.locale_text: 法技術者サービスユニット42がステーションのメイン考算機からのデータを調査した結果、ステーションが非公開の研究用に希少な超ウラン元素または天然ガスを必要としていると確認した。ステーション側としては今のところ交換条件を提示できないが、フットフォールの帝国技術局（アデプトゥス・メカニカス）の代表は援助に必ず報いるだろう。

languages.text: Nach Analyse der Daten des Hauptcogitators der Station bestätigt Lexmechanicus Diensteinheit 42, dass die Station seltene Transuranium-Elemente oder natürliches Gas für nicht näher definierte Forschungen benötigt. Die Station ihrerseits kann {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} im Moment nichts anbieten, aber die Vertreter des Adeptus Mechanicus auf Footfall werden {mf|ihn|sie} gewiss für {mf|seine|ihre} Hilfe belohnen.
languages.original_text: Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer the Rogue Trader anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay {mf|him|her} for {mf|his|her} aid.

traits.locale_text: Nach Analyse der Daten des Hauptcogitators der Station bestätigt Lexmechanicus Diensteinheit 42, dass die Station seltene Transuranium-Elemente oder natürliches Gas für nicht näher definierte Forschungen benötigt. Die Station ihrerseits kann {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} im Moment nichts anbieten, aber die Vertreter des Adeptus Mechanicus auf Footfall werden {mf|ihn|sie} gewiss für {mf|seine|ihre} Hilfe belohnen.

Nach Analyse der Daten des Hauptcogitators der Station bestätigt Lexmechanicus Diensteinheit 42, dass die Station seltene Transuranium-Elemente oder natürliches Gas für nicht näher definierte Forschungen benötigt. Die Station ihrerseits kann dir im Moment nichts im Austausch anbieten, dich die Vertreter des Adeptus Mechanicus auf Footfall werden dich gewiss für deine Hilfe belohnen.

languages.text: En consultant les données du cogitateur principal de la station, l'unité de service lexmécanicienne 42 confirme que la station nécessite des éléments de transuranium rares ou du gaz naturel pour des recherches de confidentielles. Pour sa part, la station ne peut offrir quoi que ce soit {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} en échange pour le moment, mais le représentant de l'Adeptus Mechanicus à Castel {mf|le|la} récompensera certainement pour son aide.
languages.original_text: Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer the Rogue Trader anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay {mf|him|her} for {mf|his|her} aid.

traits.locale_text: En consultant les données du cogitateur principal de la station, l'unité de service lexmécanicienne 42 confirme que la station nécessite des éléments de transuranium rares ou du gaz naturel pour des recherches de confidentielles. Pour sa part, la station ne peut offrir quoi que ce soit {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} en échange pour le moment, mais le représentant de l'Adeptus Mechanicus à Castel {mf|le|la} récompensera certainement pour son aide.

languages.text: İstasyonun ana kavramsayarından alınan verileri inceleyen Lexmekanik Hizmet Birimi 42, istasyonun tanımlanmamış bir araştırma için nadir transuranyum elementine veya doğal gaza ihtiyaç duyduğunu doğruluyor. Buna karşılık istasyon, şu anda Hür Tacir'e herhangi bir şey sunamıyor. Gelgelelim Binliman'daki Adeptus Mechanicus temsilcisi, yapılacak yardımın karşılığını kesinlikle verecektir.
languages.original_text: Upon consulting data from the station's main cogitator, Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 confirms that the station requires rare transuranium elements or natural gas for research of an undisclosed nature. For its part, the station cannot offer the Rogue Trader anything in exchange at the moment, but the Adeptus Mechanicus representative on Footfall will certainly repay {mf|him|her} for {mf|his|her} aid.
